posts.title: Pete Hegseth had an unsecured internet line set up in his office to connect to Signal, AP sources say
top_comments:
“U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth had an internet connection that bypassed the Pentagon’s security protocols set up in his office to use the Signal messaging app on a personal computer, two people familiar with the line told The Associated Press.

The existence of the unsecured internet connection is the latest revelation about Hegseth’s use of the unclassified app and raises the possibility that sensitive defense information could have been put at risk of potential hacking or surveillance.”
So he's just trying to hide some illegal shit at this point.
What’s this fuckers obsession with signal?
He has also been having a mental breakdown on television, he needs to be removed from his position as soon as possible. He is a danger to the safety of the United States.

....which synced to his phone though Bluetooth or WiFi. 

The most powerful military leader -has an open internet computer, inside his office, that synced to his phone app everytime he sat down.
Seriously can this dude be arrested or something. This is outright blatant security violations. He should be in GITMO
But, Hillary’s emails..

I mean, just out of curiosity, how do you get an insecure line added in the pentagon? Did they call up and have their ISP drill a new line in? I feel like someone somewhere had to say “yah we can’t really approve this”. It’s not like he dragged a cable through the building himself.
i miss having a government made of even 50% competent upper management

.....

Hilarys fucking emails....

Hunter Bidens laptop.

Jfc I hate these fascists and the dumb sheep that listen to them.

posts.title: Trump pardons Nevada politician who paid for her plastic surgery with funds to honor a slain officer
top_comments:
"Fiore, who does not have a law degree, was [appointed as a judge](https://apnews.com/article/politics-las-vegas-nevada-73278936d0baa571db1174aaf275d4c2) in deep-red Nye County in 2022 shortly after she lost her campaign for state treasurer.

She was elected last June to complete the unexpired term of a judge who died but had been suspended without pay amid her legal troubles. Pahrump is an hour’s drive west of Las Vegas.

In her statement Thursday, Fiore also said she plans to return to the bench next week."



why indeed

At first I was like "Why would he pardon her".. but then..

> President Donald Trump has pardoned a Nevada Republican politician who was awaiting sentencing on federal charges that she used money
A scumbag pardoning a scumbag.
The silence from the right speaks for itself
Of course he did, he stole funds from a veteran’s charity

The fraud is one thing, but personally I find this more concerning: 

"Fiore, who does not have a law degree, was appointed as a judge in deep-red Nye County in 2022 shortly after she lost her campaign for state treasurer."

For an administration that howls about DEI, they couldn't install less qualified people to more important positions if they tried.
We're only 4 months into this.
Republicans do their thing
Crime is legal. Steal from rich people. Literally just take their shit.
She’s had plastic surgery and still looks like that?

posts.title: The trade war’s wave of retail shortages will hit U.S. consumers in stages. Here’s when
top_comments: The hording will begin soon. Expect some clown hawking whatever is in short supply on Facebook marketplace soon enough.

I work in a consumer product industry and have been warning people about this for a while, just for them to often act like I'm making it up and being hyperbolic. 

Look at the ports.  Pretty low traffic.

Inventory starts when a production order goes out (and those have all stopped), from there you have what is in production on the process line, then you have the factory's warehouse of orders ready to ship, then you have the inventory that is sitting on the outgoing docks, then you have the inventory that is on the ship, then you have the inventory sitting on the incoming dock, then you have the inventory that is in the regional distribution warehouse, then you have the inventory in the store.

China has nothing sitting on their outgoing dock for America & what is on the ship is the last of what is going on a ship, while the American incoming docks are already starting to get empty and Truckers are being told that they don't need to drive back to LA after they unload their trucks.

The shelves will be empty by June and the recession will be undeniable on the 4th of July.
Empty shelves—was that your vote? Layoffs are next in stores, ports, and container trucking.
Best part is that no matter what happens retail prices will be going up.

Why won't Congress just impeach him already 
 I don't understand why Republicans are terrified of him? Do they have no idea what will happen if voters go hungry or can't purchase clothes due to empty shelves? Are they really that stupid to make their voters that mad? Whatever blackmail Trump has on them cannot be worse than American people rising up in revolt if people starve.

"... it is to soon to know for sure that shelves will run short of goods."

Ffs, basic spelling would be helpful,  NBC.

Remember the cost of goods increase during Covid? Remember how those costs never returned to a sane level? Does anyone believe that this crisis is not being created as an excuse to increase costs long term? Even after/if sanity is restored?

Greed and profit are at the center of things. As long as that is the case, this endless hunger for growth will continue. Money will be the end of us.

Well here's your free unlimited trial of the great soviet empire. You may even find out why so many of their neighbours did some wild shit to opt out. I guess you can skip a history lesson but it will not skip you.
“… to soon…” - it is NBC 😂

posts.title: Feds accidentally publish secret plan to kill NYC congestion pricing
top_comments:
>The internal 11-page letter, sent from attorneys in the Southern District of New York to a lawyer for the federal transportation department, was taken down less than an hour after it was erroneously put online.

Uh…you can’t put the toothpaste back in the tube.
States' rights, except for those we do not like, amirite?
Anyone know how to be deleted from Signal group chat, I keep getting added

The one good thing about this administration is they are so unbelievably incompetent.    

Imagine the damage they were just as sinister AND competent.
I had to double take that it didn't say congressman.
I knew all about this.Someone named Pete texted me about this yesterday! I don’t know how I got on that text chain but I think the poster is pretty tipsy;)

Trump's whole argument is BS.  He only cares about congestion pricing because he wants to hurt a blue state.   If Trump really thinks tolling interstate highways is illegal then what about Florida, New Jersey and Texas collecting a combined $5,000,000,000 annually in "unfair" tolls on interstate highways that we paid to build with tax dollars?   The Pennsylvania Turnpike was built and paid for 50 years ago and they still keep collecting those tolls.
Fitting for an administration that destroys everything and accomplishes nothing.
Their administration is so chaotic and unorganized that they can’t keep anything a secret it seems
I'd love to say this is shockingly incompetent, but it's just par for the course at this point. Thankfully their stupidity undercuts the effectiveness of their authoritarianism a bit.

Finally, the Trump admin arrests someone for immigration related fraud that deserves to be arrested and deported.

*“As alleged, Nsabumukunzi repeatedly lied to conceal his involvement in the horrific Rwandan genocide while seeking to become a lawful permanent resident and citizen of the United States,” said United States Attorney John Durham.*

He's facing a 30 year sentence, which in no way matches his crimes.  He is not, in any normal sense of the word, an immigrant.
Why do I get the feeling this one isn’t going to El Salvador…
Looks like ICE needed some good press.
A private equity entrepreneur paid for this guy's bond KNOWING that he was a fucking genocide leader? What the fuck?
While I wish his ass would go to a gulag in El Salvador’s, they should deport him back to Rwanda

Ok. I found someone to send to that mega prison in El Salvador 




(Assuming he is found guilty. Due process=good)

posts.title: Detention officers arrested after retired K9 found dead
top_comments: I know we shouldn’t judge a book by its cover, but JFC. They look like two guys who would be arrested for killing a dog.

Can anyone explain how if a suspect harms a K9 while they're on duty, they get charged with all the same crimes as they would if it was a human officer but when they're retired they lose all of that status? I know it wouldn't be murder charges but couldn't they charge the people with negligent homicide of a police officer so they get more harsh sentencing or does that not apply for retirees or off duty police? Just wondering

Oh, poor little boy. He died in his little house. Likely the only place he felt safe. Just looking for a tiny bit of love.

If I have only one wish it's for you Bane. May you live on in the eternal meadow. Where it is always the most beautiful day.
The dog staved to death lovked in a outdoor kennel with no food or water. He was dead at least a week
I always wonder what happens to retired police dogs. And while they are working- are they actually shown love? If they are retired, why not keep them?

It takes a real special kind of awful to mistreat animals.

Gonna hug my little dude a little tighter tonight because I'm thankful for every day I have with him.
They should be charged with killing an officer.  That's what any other civi who kills a police dog gets charged with.  Idc if he was retired.
They should put these two outdoors with no food, shade or water for a week.

>"According to court documents, the sheriff’s office received an anonymous tip that retired K9 Bane “was being neglected and abused” by Huffstetler.

>“The tip stated **Bane was living outside with no food, water, or shade,**” Sergeant Ashten Jackson stated in the affidavit.  
...  
“Detectives located K9 Bane deceased in a plastic dog house inside the outdoor kennel,” Jackson stated. “K9 Bane appears to have been deceased for a substantial amount of time.”

I'm not sure why the k9 handler let his son have the retired k9 officer, but I hope he has some remorse over that. Going to be you being neglected next. Poor dog. Locking up animals in small places and letting them starve to death through complete neglect has got to be some red flag for absolute fucking human garbage. Throw him in the trash.

Sounds less rebel-ly and a bit more know-what-they're-doing-y.
I have to give up up healthcare for this?
Military is an absolute joke right now
They cost that much, not worth that much. Big diiference.

What would the cost be of losing an F-35? How about two or possibly more? What would the cost be of having a naval aviator or two captured be? What would the political cost be of having a pilot paraded before the cameras of the world be? What intelligence would such captures be able to reveal? Such costs would be far greater. 

Drones like these are designed to take the place of manned flights. Such drones are designed to be expendable. The 200 million spent pales in comparison to what it could have cost the nation. They did their job.
Yet Israel, our 53rd state, has universal healthcare. Including abortion on demand.

posts.title: California’s economy surpasses Japan’s as it becomes fourth largest in world
top_comments: But conservatives said that it's a failed state.are you implying that they lied?
And why does California need the other 49 states?
As a Midwesterner and a lover of my city ...I've lately caught myself asking myself "hm...can I find a job in Cali that offsets the cost of living? What about other blue states?" 🤔
It‘s time for them to leave the other loser states and to join Canada 😅

MAGA screams daily (in every possible form of media) that hundreds of thousands of people are leaving California every second.  They scream that California is a dead and broken state.  A poor state.  A place only fit for the criminals that have illegally entered the US.  

And yet.....Cali is now the 4th largest economy on the planet. 

Both these things can't be true.  One is instantly and credibly verifiable using financial data.  The other is the slobbering moans of insipid losers.
[deleted]
It'll be interesting when they have the next disaster and Benedict Donald says FEMA is broke. I hope they refuse to send their tax money to the taker red states.
Not denying California has a load of companies headquartered there, but how much does the high cost of living and inflated prices play into this?
Not sure if this is good news for California or bad news for the rest of the world.

Definitely didn’t feel any richer or better off when I lived there. On the contrary I was being suffocated by basic living costs while being told how amazing and perfect the place is and how I should feel somehow *grateful* for the opportunity to be a broke bitch there. 

Felt like an abusive relationship tbh.

posts.title: The trade war’s wave of retail shortages will hit U.S. consumers in stages. Here’s when
top_comments: The hording will begin soon. Expect some clown hawking whatever is in short supply on Facebook marketplace soon enough.

I work in a consumer product industry and have been warning people about this for a while, just for them to often act like I'm making it up and being hyperbolic. 

Look at the ports.  Pretty low traffic.

Inventory starts when a production order goes out (and those have all stopped), from there you have what is in production on the process line, then you have the factory's warehouse of orders ready to ship, then you have the inventory that is sitting on the outgoing docks, then you have the inventory that is on the ship, then you have the inventory sitting on the incoming dock, then you have the inventory that is in the regional distribution warehouse, then you have the inventory in the store.

China has nothing sitting on their outgoing dock for America & what is on the ship is the last of what is going on a ship, while the American incoming docks are already starting to get empty and Truckers are being told that they don't need to drive back to LA after they unload their trucks.

The shelves will be empty by June and the recession will be undeniable on the 4th of July.
Empty shelves—was that your vote? Layoffs are next in stores, ports, and container trucking.
Best part is that no matter what happens retail prices will be going up.

Why won't Congress just impeach him already 
 I don't understand why Republicans are terrified of him? Do they have no idea what will happen if voters go hungry or can't purchase clothes due to empty shelves? Are they really that stupid to make their voters that mad? Whatever blackmail Trump has on them cannot be worse than American people rising up in revolt if people starve.

"... it is to soon to know for sure that shelves will run short of goods."

Ffs, basic spelling would be helpful,  NBC.

Remember the cost of goods increase during Covid? Remember how those costs never returned to a sane level? Does anyone believe that this crisis is not being created as an excuse to increase costs long term? Even after/if sanity is restored?

Greed and profit are at the center of things. As long as that is the case, this endless hunger for growth will continue. Money will be the end of us.

Well here's your free unlimited trial of the great soviet empire. You may even find out why so many of their neighbours did some wild shit to opt out. I guess you can skip a history lesson but it will not skip you.
“… to soon…” - it is NBC 😂

posts.title: Pete Hegseth had an unsecured internet line set up in his office to connect to Signal, AP sources say
top_comments:
“U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth had an internet connection that bypassed the Pentagon’s security protocols set up in his office to use the Signal messaging app on a personal computer, two people familiar with the line told The Associated Press.

The existence of the unsecured internet connection is the latest revelation about Hegseth’s use of the unclassified app and raises the possibility that sensitive defense information could have been put at risk of potential hacking or surveillance.”
